Description: Male SD card with flat cable out - will connect to Pi via GPIO pins
From flat ribbon (SD Extender) to GPIO pins of Pi. Needs to be to female to slot onto Pi - Ideally include strain relief
column6: Need to confirm the number of pins (When SD extender arrives) - Think 10

Description: BMT MAX44009 I2C AMB LIGHT SENSOR
Will do all the data processing of the device and has WiFi to create the local network that will be used for remote access
For use in the Pi and will act as the SD card that the camera trap uses
